name: Arcane City: Lyn;Lin
description:
🅰🆁🅲🅰🅽🅴 🅲🅸🆃🆈: 🅻🆈🅽;🅻🅸🅽 Caleeca-san is back! Caleeca ('The Virgin') stars in a story of her very own!  It has been several years since Lin Caleeca left the Asylum and changed her career. A dark mystery awaits her and will test her on every level.

We recommend playing 'The Virgin' first, though this Kinetic Visual Novel CAN be played as a standalone.


18+ only:  disturbing content, blood, violence, sexual themes, dread and guro.

We hope you enjoy it! Please leave a review! - Arcane City Game Studios
